mapper.select: SELECT * FROM (SELECT qna_no, qna_title, LAG(qna_title) over (ORDER BY qna_title) AS beforeQnA, LAG(qna_no) over (ORDER BY qna_title) AS beforeNo, LEAD(qna_title) over (ORDER BY qna_title) AS afterQnA, LEAD(qna_no) over (ORDER BY qna_title) AS afterNo FROM qna) a WHERE qna_no = #{qna_no}
